prompts: Create a dragon-like Pokemon with fiery orange scales and majestic blue wings.
I want a fierce fire and flying-type creature that breathes flames.
Generate an image of a Pokemon that can soar through the skies while breathing fire.
Make a legendary creature that combines both dragon and fire elements in its design.
Imagine a powerful Pokemon with a long tail and an intimidating presence.
Design a Pokemon that has a fiery personality and loves to battle in the mountains.
Give me a Pokemon that is known for its strength and ability to fly high above the clouds.

distinctive_features: Flame at the tip of the tail
